LanguageData.DMS_CallDrop.label: Backup Support
LanguageData.DMS_CallDrop.description: Send a reinforcement request to an automated industrial facility in orbit, reinforcements will be dispatched based on the identification code of the transceiver.
LanguageData.DMS_CallDrop_Falcon.label: Falcon Backup Support
LanguageData.DMS_CallDrop_Falcon.description: Send a reinforcement request for a Falcon to an automated industrial facility in orbit, reinforcements will be dispatched based on the identification code of the transceiver.
